messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Untill we have a proper Captain, Guardsss-The-Goodsss isss in charge

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a number of mice have descended into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: There is a snake on your shuttle due to this biohazzard outbreak we are going to decontaminate the entire shuttle
